Problems detected on the fuel and intake air measurements, emissions control systems, etc.
Problems detected on the fuel injection device and the supercharger (turbo) related system.
Problems detected on Ignition control system or cylinder misfire occurred.
Problems detected on the engine idle control or the vehicle speed control system such as cruise control system.
Problems detected on the communication between the computer modules controlling the engine, transmission, etc..
Problems detected on the drive control system controlling the transmission and clutches.
Problems detected on some parts of the powertrain systems.
Problems detected on the body control system controlling vehicle doors, windows, sheets, wipers, and various lamps / buttons.
Problems detected on the chassis control system controlling ABS, TCS, parking brake, power steering, etc.
Problems detected on the in-vehicle communications network for sending and receiving data.
Please visit your nearest maintenance company or refer to the manufacturer\'s maintenance guide.
Problem detected on car %s system, etc.\nStop driving ASAP and please visit your nearest maintenance company or contact your insurance company.
No problems have found.
